Today we're taking a closer look at an NFT project called...CryptoonGoonz!**_ ## Looking Back With Fondness For many of us, the lives of those who came before us and the numerous events that transpired are a source of perpetual fascination. We often wonder what life was like 'back then' and try to discern how culture has shifted over the years, comparing what was valued and upheld then with what we hold dear now. Regardless of your perception or understanding of the past, the world today is vastly different from the world back then. There seems to be something about the vintage that evokes a sense of nostalgia within us, and for those of us who are particularly sentimental, we tend to view the art, cartoons and music of yesteryear through a favorable lens. In many regards, the rise of NFTs within the cryptosphere has led to what has been dubbed a 'Digital Renaissance,' and so artists and creators are exploring all kinds of avenues that traverse time and space in weird and wonderful ways. Vintage projects seems to be a subset or genre within the world of NFTs, and here on MSQ, we've already taken a look at projects like [Flowtys,](https://www.flowtys.com/) [Blood Pact](https://www.bloodpact.io/) and [Tony Babel.](https://twitter.com/TonyBabel) Each of these is an attempt to capture or relive the cartoon and animation style of the 1920s and 30s, and each approaches this goal in its own novel way. ![](https://i.imgur.com/bE4gWXr.gif) > Vintage animation was highly experimental at times, and given the limited color palette and technology available during that period, was characteristically odd, musically driven and even somewhat unsettling, verging into the realms of the uncanny more often than not. There was no real regard for what was 'safe' or 'correct,' and while many may find the content of some such animations questionable, it is still a very important part of our history that deserves attention and recognition Today's Discovery of the Day falls comfortably under the banner of the Vintage and does so with gusto. I for one find these kinds of projects to be particularly interesting, and hopefully, you do as well. ## Toonz 'n Goonz [CryptoonGoonz](https://www.cryptoongoonz.com) is a sold-out collection of 6,969 ERC-721 vintage cartoon-inspired NFTs registered on the [Ethereum](https://ethereum.org) Blockchain and stored via [IPFS](https://ipfs.io). Very nice! There's even a [Goonz Shop](https://cryptoongoonz.shop) where you can score sick merch like shirts, stickers, and more... Much like the bestest of the best projects do, CryptoonGoonz uses multi-signature security via their [Gnosis Safe Wallet](https://gnosis-safe.io/app/eth:0xD4E4f0A85F8d8f7C0bA36Ef676812790eeD67603), so you can rest assured that your Goonz are safe from evil ne'er-do-wells. And if that's not enough, holding a CryptoonGoonz NFT means you also have DAO voting _**and**_ [ownership rights](https://www.cryptoongoonz.com/terms) over your precious PFPs. Yes, you read that right...actual ownership, meaning you actually have full control over the asset. This is definitely important and the hallmark of a project that takes the role of NFTs very seriously.
![](https://i.imgur.com/TOtSAnY.gif)

**Rock out with your Toonz out via the CryptoonGoonz [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/playlist/2mWPO6qQkPIgqgEqQoZ4lK?si=e512643c63ce4477) playlist!**
So what goes in to making each CryptoonGoonz NFT so unique and special? Well, a couple of different traits actually. Each one of these Goonz comes with its own Head, Eyes, Mouth, Body, Accessory, Shorts, Hands and Shoes. Take a look at the example below—observe the flaming marshmallow head, the spooky skeleton body and uh...broken beer bottle being held with intent. I think you get the idea. ![](https://i.imgur.com/y7C9vkd.png)
**Listen, if your head was on fire, you wouldn't be this calm...**
CryptoonGoonz are indeed walking to the right with purpose. Some of them are more polite and easy-going while others carry swords or a less than appropriate attitude. The point here is that the time and energy put into the art is admirable, and you can be pretty confident that the Goon (or Goonz) you get will be one of a kind, practically irreplaceable and, therefore, provably rare. Score! ## You've Reached the End of Part 1! Uh yeah, I know this is a weird one, but as it turns out, CryptoonGoonz literally *just* completed their first Roadmap and are in the process of putting together their plans for the next leg of their journey.
![](https://i.imgur.com/GJq5g31.jpg)
CryptoonGoonz has already achieved a lot, and judging by the size of its following, it's set to be here for the foreseeable future. With such strong fundamentals and attention to detail, it's virtually impossible to ignore CryptoonGoonz. Oh, and they're real good frens with [Alien Frens,](https://alienfrens.io/) in case you didn't know...
![](twitter:Cryptoon_Goonz/status/1480659391573549057)
> Check out this MSQ Discovery of the Day by [Reece Smith](https://MSQ.io/users/reece): [Alien Frens - NFT Pals from Another World](https://MSQ.io/blog/alien-frens-nft-pals-from-another-world) ## The Minds Behind the Madness Being best friends since they were eight years old, Joel and Sean are able to understand each other and work together effortlessly to achieve their goals. Shortly after coming up with the idea for the project, CryptoonGoonz quickly became a passion project with a lot of work involved. However, seeing everything come together into something they could both be proud of is nothing short of magnificent in my opinion. ![](https://i.imgur.com/ezWzN2p.png)
**[Joel](https://twitter.com/joel_cryptoon) and [Sean](https://twitter.com/SeanTat2s) are the brains of this operation**

**Check out the GaryVee Podcast interview of CryptoonGoonz creator Sean on [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/playlist/2mWPO6qQkPIgqgEqQoZ4lK?si=e512643c63ce4477)**

name: NFTs by The Prince of Darkness - CryptoBatz
body:
***Hello and welcome to today's Discovery of the Day! MSQ recently moved into its Open Beta, meaning you can now sign up for a profile and enjoy all the site has to offer. From Monday to Friday we bring you our Discovery of the Day series of articles in which we showcase some of our top picks from across the cryptosphere. Whether it's NFTs, Blockchain gaming or the metaverse, you'll be able to find it all right here on MSQ! Today we take a look at a project by someone famous for being the Godfather of Metal...yup, it's the one and only Ozzy Osbourne with his NFT project, CryptoBatz!*** ## The Prince of Darkness ![](https://i.imgur.com/UFfgszi.gif) No no, not *that* Prince of Darkness. I mean [Ozzy Osbourne,](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ozzy_Osbourne) the frontman and vocalist of legendary Metal band [Black Sabbath.](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Black_Sabbath) I owe a whole lot to these pioneers of the slow, chugging, doom-infused brand of music that has since exploded in popularity and splintered into every conceivable sub-genre under the sun—Death Metal, Black Metal, Thrash, Grindcore, Power Metal, Doom...the list of artists and musicians Black Sabbath is basically responsible for bringing into being is virtually endless. John Michael 'Ozzy' Osbourne was born on December 3rd, 1948 to Lillian and Jack Osbourne. 21 years later, along with [Tony Iommi,](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tony_Iommi) [Geezer Butler](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Geezer_Butler) and [Bill Ward,](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bill_Ward_(musician)) Ozzy would form Black Sabbath, widely regarded as the world's first-ever Metal band. Their debut album *[Black Sabbath](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BlackSabbath(album))* released on February 13th 1970, and in 2019, it was estimated that the band had sold a total of 70 million albums from across their discography over the five decades of their existence. ![](https://i.imgur.com/RAGtIT6.jpg)
***Black Sabbath* by Black Sabbath (1970) was recorded in a single day on October 16th, 1969**
Now I could obviously go on about Ozzy and his legacy for hours and hours, but that's not the point of this article. Believe it or not, The Prince of Darkness, now (somehow?) 73, is into crypto and Blockchain technology! Say what!? That might just be the coolest thing I've ever heard! Ozzy isn't the only metalhead into NFTs though...in fact, my good pal [Simon Downey](https://MSQ.io/users/simon) told me about [Megadeth](https://megadeth.com/) and their NFTs, which you can view right [here.](https://megadeth.io/) Seems like a lot of top Metal bands and artists are embracing NFTs, and in today's Discovery of the Day, you'll see that Ozzy himself is more than into it—he's heading up his own NFT project! ## Straight off the NFT Bat! Whether you're aware of the story or not, on January 20th, 1982, Ozzy Osbourne was busy performing at a concert in Des Moines, Iowa. One of the audience members decided to sneak a dead bat into the concert and threw it on stage in front of Ozzy. Mistaking the bat for a toy, Ozzy picked up the deceased creature and promptly...bit off its head. ![](https://i.imgur.com/FfqC4qo.gif)
**Ozzy reprised his role as bat biter in Adam Sandler's *[Little Nicky](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/LittleNicky)* (2000)**
Almost 30 years since the original bat head chomping, Ozzy has launched [CryptoBatz,](https://www.cryptobatz.com/) a collection of 9,666 (that number is no mistake) NFT Bats that dwell in the caves of the [Ethereum](https://ethereum.org/) Blockchain. Yes, this delightfully diabolical collection is built by 'a team of NFT obsessed nerds known as [Sutter Systems.'](https://twitter.com/SutterSystems) Seems like the team behind CryptoBatz is a formidable one that is also pushing to innovate and bring new utility to NFT fans through this project that's being overseen by Ozzy Osbourne himself! ![](https://i.imgur.com/sq7mxNd.gif)
**I see an Ozzy Bat, a Vampire Bat, a Skeletor Bat...blink and you'll miss 'em!**
## Vampiric NFTs? Hold on a cotton pickin' minute...just what's going on with this project? So like Herbert West from *[Re-Animator](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Re-Animator)* (1985), the members of Sutter Systems are a little more on the, shall we say, 'mad' side? So in an effort to create an NFT project that truly stands out from other collections, the team spent a great deal of time and energy developing something that would effectively imbue each and every CryptoBat with a truly unique power. What is this power, you ask? Well, CryptoBatz will be able to uh...'bite' an NFT from another Blue Chip project, thus leading to the creation of a 'MutantBat' that possesses the digital DNA of both tokens! ![](https://i.imgur.com/kD8frNx.png)
**Hmmm, now where have I seen this MutantBat before?**
Now there is a catch here, so pay close attention. A CryptoBat can only bite **once**, so before letting your CryptoBat bite an NFT, think very carefully about what you choose, because this will ultimately determine what kind of MutantBat will be created. In addition, if you want your CryptoBat to bite a 'Victim,' you will need to hold that Blue Chip NFT in the same wallet as your CryptoBat. Biting utility isn't active yet but will be enabled soon after the public mint takes place (date TBD). At present, the list of Blue Chip 'Victim Projects' your CryptoBat can bite includes: - [Bored Ape Yacht Club](https://boredapeyachtclub.com/#/) - [CrypToadz](https://cryptoadz.io/) - [SupDucks](https://supducks.com/) - [Alien Frens](https://alienfrens.io/) ## Doing the Maths on the Batz Yes, there is indeed more to CryptoBatz than meets the eyes. In terms of the composition and design of the CryptoBatz, the Fibonacci Sequence (or [Golden Ratio](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Golden_ratio)) has been employed to ensure that the Batz, while dark, spooky and outrageous, are pleasing to look at. Also, all the traits that make up the CryptoBatz were selected by Ozzy, so every single minted CryptoBat will be truly special since they're the product of Ozzy's creative choices. That's seriously awesome! ![](https://i.imgur.com/6P0De84.png) ## AncientBatz So those individuals who hold a CryptoBat will be eligible to participate in an epic treasure hunt! Right, so remember how I mentioned that CryptoBatz can only bite once? Well, if you're lucky enough to find one, AncientBatz are capable of biting up to *ninety-nine* (99) times, giving them the unmatched ability to breed a whopping 99 MutantBatz! Wowzers! Every one of the AncientBatz has been custom designed by some of the most renowned and talented artists in the world, so anyone who manages to get their hands on one not only has a unique NFT with a huge amount of utility, but a piece of digital art that is virtually one of a kind. Finding such rare and powerful Batz won't be easy though since the team has scattered the AncientBatz across the face of the planet. Who knows? An AncientBatz NFT may be in a river, high up a mountain or hiding in the recesses of a sewer. In others words, these special Batz really aren't easy to find—at all. Every week clues and hints will be provided to the most engaged and active members of the CryptoBatz community, gradually revealing the locations of AncientBatz, thus making them easier to find as time goes by. name: Collect and Trade NFT City Blocks in Metroverse
body:
***Hey everyone! Welcome to another great Discovery of the Day in which we bring you one of our top picks from the realm of NFTs, Blockchain gaming and the metaverse. MSQ recently moved into its Open Beta, meaning you can now sign up for a profile and explore all the site has to offer, so be sure to get your profile and join our growing community. In today's edition we take a closer look at an NFT land trading strategy game built on Ethereum...Welcome to Metroverse!*** ## SimCity Gone Blockchain? When I was a kid I played many different kinds of games—real-time strategy, first-person shooters, role-playing games, you name it, I was into it...or at the very least, I had experience in each genre. I distinctly remember certain simulator games that I particularly enjoyed including [Jane's Longbow Gold,](https://www.pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/Jane%27s_Longbow_Gold) [Simcopter](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SimCopter) and [SimCity 2000.](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SimCity_2000) If you had to gauge my interests based on these three games alone, it would be flying helicopters and running cities (which I assure you isn't the case). Anyway, in SimCity 2000, you get the opportunity to build up your own metropolis and ensure that its inhabitants are provided with all the necessary facilities and infrastructure they require in order to live their lives and meaningfully contribute to society. Now this is much easier said than done—you have to set tax rates, build roads and highways, provide residents with electricity, construct schools and hospitals, and take great care ensuring that garbage and sewage are adequately dealt with. In many ways, these duties are just the tip of the iceberg as there are a host of other considerations you need to make. In addition, natural disasters and, um...alien invasions (I'm serious) could really put a damper on your plans. ![](https://i.imgur.com/xNyEcvn.png)
**There you are, just minding your own business, and then BOOM! Aliens!**
Aliens and tornadoes aside, SimCity 2000 was not an easy game, and at the age of 8 or 9, I found myself impeached on more than one occasion (the nerve of my constituents, really!) Having said this, I was able to build some pretty awesome cities, one of which was along a coastline that I created as an homage to my hometown of [Durban, South Africa.](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Durban) After several years serving as the expansive urban megalith's mayor, I was booted for reasons I can't recall (something about mismanagement of funds or something, you know the drill). Needless to say I've been a SimCity fan since, so having stumbled across today's Discovery of the Day, you can bet that my interest was piqued. The prospect of a Blockchain version of SimCity, or even just something akin to it, is very intriguing indeed. So, without further ado, let's get into it! ## Your Very Own City Block(chain) [Metroverse](https://metroverse.com/) is an NFT-based land trading strategy game constructed on the foundations of the [Ethereum](https://ethereum.org/) Blockchain. There are a total of 10,000 city blocks in the Metroverse with each one being characteristically unique. A single block, represented by an ERC-721 NFT, may contain residential, industrial, commercial and/or public buildings. Since each block is an NFT, there will only ever be one of each minted, and given their distinct features and intricate layouts, they are virtually impossible to replicate. Players must use a strategic approach to collect and trade city blocks so that they can grow their economies and earn $MET, Metroverse's in-game currency. The main idea is to collect multiple city blocks and build up neighborhoods since every block yields MET tokens, and so with more blocks in action, more MET can be generated. $MET can be used within the game's economy to improve players' holdings and generate even more MET in the process. ### Zones So let's see one of these city blocks up close and discuss some of its features in a little more detail: ![](https://i.imgur.com/J8Bppb7.jpg) > City blocks contain a beautifully colorful visual representation of the NFT itself as well as a few key metrics. In the bottom left-hand corner you'll spot three colored letters and bars along with numbers to the right of each. **R** stands for residential, **C** for commercial and **I** for industry. You'll notice here that **R** and **C** have scores of 121 and 125 respectively while **I** only has a score of 90. In the bottom right-hand corner you'll see the number 336, the total score that this NFT has when the three adjacent figures are added up. The total score of a given block is always between 200 and 400—no more, no less ### Pathways Pathways describe the different kinds of infrastructure that allow for transportation to occur within each city block. As such, Pathways may consist of: - Streets - Railways, and - Rivers Every single city block will feature one horizontal and one vertical pathway that appears in a random location within a block. Since there are always two pathways, 15 tiles are always dedicated to them while the remaining 49 are for buildings. ![](https://i.imgur.com/0yV20Zs.jpg) ## City Councilors The team behind Metroverse is pretty extensive and includes developers, designers, artists and community management specialists with several years of experience in their respective fields. ### Development - [0xSlice](https://twitter.com/0xSlice) - Silicon Valley tech entrepreneur - [0xSlime](https://twitter.com/0xSlime) - Web3 based crypto-native - [0xAyam](https://twitter.com/0xAyam) - Dev and crypto native - [0xBobsky](https://twitter.com/0xbobsky) - Coding since the age of 14 ### Design - [0xHedgehog](https://twitter.com/0xHedgehog) - The genius behind Metroverse's design - [0xRam](https://twitter.com/0xRam) - 3D designer specializing in stylized art and Blender ### Community - Mrs Slime - Over a decade of management experience - [0xDrill](https://twitter.com/0xdrill) - Metroverse-based intersex citizen with 9 years of experience in tech - [0xJugga](https://twitter.com/0xjugga) - 18-year-old NFT enthusiast - [0xAdo](https://twitter.com/0xado) - 18-year-old tech fanatic ![](https://i.imgur.com/knyUvHn.png) ## Urban Roadmap Metroverse is right at the beginning of its journey, so pretty much everything on their Roadmap is about to happen or due to be fulfilled in the near future. Once the $MET token has launched, Mayors will be available for mint. Later, Metroverse plans to release a Player versus Player (PvP) game, but only once Mayors have been introduced into the mix. See for yourself: ![](https://i.imgur.com/vaSyE4U.png) > If you want to check out the Metroverse Roadmap in its original form, click [here](https://metroverse.com/) ## The Future of Metroverse There's a lot going on with Metroverse, but in short, the Whitelist Sale takes place on Tuesday, January 18th while the Public Sale will be held one day later on Wednesday, January 19th. FYI, according to their website, each city block will cost 0.1 ETH (excluding gas) to mint. ![](https://i.imgur.com/MzEVRoK.png) So is Metroverse popular? Judging by their substantially large social media following, I would confidently answer 'yes.' Just take a look at this Twitter post regarding their upcoming mint on Tuesday:
![](twitter:themetroverse/status/1482423376434110464)
So yeah, Metroverse seems to have garnered a whole lot of interest and support, and based on their active Twitter and awesome looking NFTs, it seems like this support will continue to grow for the foreseeable future. For this reason I strongly recommend you follow Metroverse on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/themetroverse) and join their [Discord](https://discord.com/invite/metroverse) so that you receive all the latest news as and when it's released. > For more information about Metroverse, check out their FAQ section on their [official website](https://metroverse.com/) and/or read their [Documentation](https://docs.metroverse.com/introduction/summary) Thanks for joining me today. If you haven't signed up for a MSQ profile yet, get to it so that you can check out the site in all its glory and get all the latest Blockchain news and views you so direly crave. Until we meet again crypto fans, stay safe and keep an eye out for those incredible projects. Bye! ![](https://i.imgur.com/UQlaCsM.jpg) *Join the [MSQ Discord](https://discord.com/invite/d6Es4qRNAQ) and participate in weekly and holiday events when they become available! Make sure you join our growing NFT community so you can stay on top of news, the latest drops, and everything non-fungible.*

Today we take a look at an NFT project that portrays powerful, expressive women and non-binary people from all walks of life...This is Non-Fungible People!*** ## We Are Not the Same (And That's OK) Wouldn't life be fantastic if we all looked, sounded and acted the same? Well, that reality might be a more peaceful one, but from my perspective, it sounds a little...boring. While we are all equal in terms of our human rights and responsibilities, to say we are all the same, or at the very least 'identical,' is a bit of a stretch. There are people of all different shapes and sizes, skin tones, attitudes, religious beliefs, body types and genders...the list is pretty extensive. And there's absolutely nothing wrong with any of this—diversity is one of the things that makes being human such a profoundly unique experience. In the postmodern world, the issue of identity is one that is becoming increasingly important as more and more people are born and 'standing out' becomes exponentially more challenging. Who am I? What does it mean to be human? And what are the things the constitute my own experience and shape my thoughts and perceptions? These and similar questions are present within the minds of countless millions of people, and for good reason as well. It's important that we reflect on these questions and challenge our own beliefs so that we can learn constructive ways to become kinder humans and treat others with the same love and respect that we wish to receive. ![](https://i.imgur.com/e2MBYpD.gif)
**The late [David Bowie's](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Bowie) alter ego, [Ziggy Stardust,](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Rise_and_Fall_of_Ziggy_Stardust_and_the_Spiders_from_Mars) challenged conventional notions of identity and sexuality**
With the advent of the metaverse, virtual reality and NFTs, the issue of identity is doubtlessly becoming more complex as people focus on creating their own personas around profile pics and avatars that may not even be human. It therefore stands to reason that some NFT projects are pushing the envelope a little more when it comes to exploring issues of identity and further expanding on the extent of our perceptions. ## Non-Fungible People [Non-Fungible People](https://nfp.daz3d.com/) is a collection of expertly rendered 3D avatars that features lifelike women and non-binary people from all walks of life. Each NFT includes a fully rigged 3D model built for utility within and across the metaverse. Non-Fungible People NFTs consist of a variety of different traits including hair, clothing, makeup, expressions, eye color and more. Like every woman and non-binary person IRL, this collection emphasizes how unique and nuanced each and every NFP is. ![](https://i.imgur.com/M5yImqq.jpg)
**Beautiful, quirky and mysterious, Non-Fungible people certainly has its own distinct allure**
One of the best parts of Non-Fungible People is the sheer level of utility you get out of a single NFT. Owning an NFP gives you the ability to create games, render animations and/or produce your own videos. This is because each 3D figure is compatible with popular programs such as [Blender](https://www.blender.org/), [Unreal](https://www.unrealengine.com/en-US/), [Unity](https://unity.com/) and [Daz Studio](https://www.daz3d.com/). With regards to the latter, since NFP NFTs are Daz Studio models, you can add or remove assets and position them as desired in order to create your own 3D works of art. The real beauty of Non-Fungible People is that, when you hold an NFP, you own it in its entirety and can do anything you'd like with it. ![](https://i.imgur.com/lONljZd.png)

name: Propel - Does a Metaverse Toolbox Matter?
body:
_**Welcome back to another amazing Discovery of the Day, MSQ fam! MSQ recently moved into its Open Beta, meaning you can sign up for a profile and explore all the site has to offer. From Monday to Friday, we bring you some of the best projects from across the cryptosphere. Whether it’s NFTs, the Metaverse, or Blockchain games, you’ll find it all right here on MSQ! Today we're taking a closer look at...Propel!**_ ## To Innovate Is Human The use of tools predates the emergence of our earliest ancestors and is considered to have been essential to our evolution. What appears to be earlier iterations of the stone hand axe have been found to have existed as far back as several million years ago. *Australopithecus Afarensis* is believed to have carved animal carcasses; their hands were well suited for the controlled manipulation of objects. Even today, our primate cousins are often observed using tools to dig, probe soil and trees for insects, groom themselves, defend against attackers, and even communicate with one another. And while these primitive examples bear little resemblance to the tools of today, this serves as a reminder of how critical and transformative the mastery of tools has been to humankind. Tools aren't only a reflection of our technological innovations over the millennia; they are the very things that have driven our evolution from the stone age all the way through to the modern era. ![](https://i.imgur.com/NF4kiBy.jpg)
**Lower Palaeolithic Acheulean Handaxe**
**(dated approx. 500,000 - 300,000 years ago)**
source: [Wikimedia Commons](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/87/Biface_Cintegabelle_MHNT_PRE_2009.0.201.1_V2.jpg/1024px-Biface_Cintegabelle_MHNT_PRE_2009.0.201.1_V2.jpg)
## Propelling Ourselves Forward We inherently cannot know what the next step in our evolution will be, but the emergence of the Digital Age has shown us that our social and financial infrastructures are due for innovation. The world has changed, and new tools are needed. Today, we take a closer look at [Propel](https://propel.xyz), a plug-n-play development toolkit enabling the rapid deployment of a variety of digital infrastructures and services, including: - **Metaverse as a Service (MaaS)** - **DeFi as a Service (DaaS)**, and - **Staking as a Service (SaaS)** All the more impressive is that this toolkit is chain-agnostic, meaning it can be used across dozens of networks, including [Bitcoin,](https://bitcoin.org/) [Ethereum,](https://ethereum.org/) and [Solana.](https://solana.com/) Propel's source code is also fully [audited,](https://github.com/PropelXYZ/audits) something any serious project should never go without. ![](https://i.imgur.com/OrQAz2p.jpg)
**View the Propel Whitepaper [here](https://propel.xyz/static/media/PropelWhitepaper.7d4d055e.pdf)**
## Metaverse as a Service (MaaS) A metaverse wide detonation is on the way. Hence, Propel introduced Metaverse as a Service (MaaS) to enable projects to get started quickly and free developers from having to start from scratch. The Blockchain plugins required to establish a metaverse environment are included in MaaS. **Smart Verse Contracts** fuel automated verification, negotiation, resolution, and performance. The metaverse is based on smart contracts interconnected with each other through the logic of creation and the functionality they are used for where users are able to own and control their digital identities. **GameFi** uses Propel's $PEL token for player transactions; investors may also buy NFTs in-game and resell them on the secondary market as their value rises. This also allows for the creation and disbursement of raffle tickets and NFT Battle fusing, where users can burn multiple NFTs to mint new ones. **NFT Utilities** enable renting NFTs (re-NFT) where lenders can earn passive income; fractional NFTs (f-NFT), which are essentially fractionalized versions of a traditional NFT; as well as staking NFTs (s-NFT). In combination, these serve as the **Core Metaverse** toolkit; Propel's complete, configurable, and secure solution for integrating the ERC standards into a project, saving precious development time. ![](https://i.imgur.com/HGTXBRA.gif) ## DeFi as a Service (DaaS) A plug-n-play DeFi solution for new and existing projects to spin up custom DeFi smart contracts such as cross-chain bridges, LP Staking, Token creation, Multisig wallets, Vesting contracts, and Investor dashboards. **Cross-chain Bridges** are a white-labeled DeFi solution that helps projects set up bridges across multiple supported ecosystems, including Ethereum, Polygon, BSC, and other Layer2 chains. **Custom Solutions** - Each project is unique; therefore, Propel develops customized solutions to meet clients' needs and help them achieve maximum ROI and exposure. The **Investor Dashboard** module is a customizable interface for Blockchain projects to design token sale campaigns and manage tokenomics as per their configured vesting schedule. **Staking / LP Staking** is a module supporting single-asset staking and LP staking from multiple popular AMMs like [Uniswap](https://uniswap.org/) and [PancakeSwap.](https://pancakeswap.finance/) ![](https://i.imgur.com/7v4q4Hy.png)
**Visit the Propel App [here](https://app.propel.xyz)**
## Staking as a Service (SaaS) The Propel pool provides a way to reward users for staking single assets, LP tokens, and traditional tokens. Through Propel pool, users can earn passive income and allow projects to increase the demand for their tokens. **Single Asset Staking** where users can deposit a token and are rewarded proportionally according to the magnitude of their staked amount. **LP Staking** allows users to deposit LP tokens (token pairs) and are rewarded with tokens proportional to the size of their staked amount. **Time Capped Staking** offers whale protection; a user will be allowed maximum tokens capping for a certain period of time to have fair participation. **Basket Rewards** where users deposit a given token and are rewarded with multiple different tokens proportionate to the size of their staked amount. ## $PEL Token ![](https://i.imgur.com/PfNwGNt.png) $PEL is Propel's native governance token. Staking, reward sharing through providing liquidity to or safeguarding the protocol, as well as governance procedures, will all use $PEL as the fundamental utility token across a portfolio of Propel products. $PEL, which may be utilized to engage in platform governance, is earned by actual participation in protocol operations and maintenance. This technique enables ecosystem alignment by creating a fair incentivization model and allowing for community-driven governance. $PEL contains features such as: - **Staking** - Users can stake $PEL to earn rewards and participate in Launchpools; - **Governance** - Where users can signal their intention to make platform decisions via $PEL native token governance, and - **Deflation via Platform Growth** - As Propel grows, $PEL is retained and acquired for B2B deals Additional $PEL Token Metrics: - **Max Supply** - 100,000,000 - **Binance Smart Chain Token Contract (BEP-20)** - [0xa75e7928d3de682e3f44da60c26f33117c4e6c5c](https://bscscan.com/token/0xa75e7928d3de682e3f44da60c26f33117c4e6c5c) ## So _Does_ This Matter? Some see things like Crypto, NFTs, and the Metaverse as passing fads, but the same was said for the internet, the radio, and even the printing press itself. And while [Gutenberg](https://wikipedia.org/wiki/Johannes_Gutenberg) could never have foreseen Blogs and Blockchains, his invention undeniably shaped the future of communications and commerce. What's beyond the horizon is often hard to imagine, but the tools of today drive the innovations of tomorrow. So **_does_ a Metaverse toolbox _really_ matter?** I'd argue that it does. If there's anything our world needs, it's a new way forward. And what better way than by making our digital infrastructures more tangible and accessible to all? Be sure to follow Propel on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/propelxyz) and visit their blog on [Medium](https://propelxyz.medium.com) to keep up on the latest news and developments. If you're code-savvy, you can also take a deeper dive via the Propel [GitHub](https://github.com/propelxyz). Thanks again for stopping by, MSQ friends. There's plenty to look forward to this year, and we hope to see you right back here as we continue to bring you the latest and greatest in NFTs, Blockchain gaming, the metaverse and more! And don't forget to create your profile on [MSQ](https://MSQ.io), the New Homepage for the Decentralized Web! name: Own Prime Metaverse Real Estate in Ethereum Towers!
body:
***Hello everyone and welcome to today's Discovery of the Day! MSQ recently moved into its Open Beta, meaning you can sign up for a profile and explore all the site has to offer. From Monday to Friday we bring you our top picks from the world of NFTs, Blockchain gaming and the metaverse in the form of a Discovery of the Day. In today's edition we zoom in on a metaverse project that's quite literally building 'up'...this is Ethereum Towers!*** ## The Sky's the Limit Over the years, human beings have managed to build some of the most incredible structures imaginable—the pyramids of Giza, the Colosseum, Stonehenge, and the Taj Mahal are just a few of the most extraordinary pieces of architecture that have endured for hundreds or even thousands of years. Soaring cathedrals, massive universities, complex waterways and gigantic monuments can be found in just about every continent on the planet and are testament to the ingenuity and strength of the human spirit. In the last few decades we have dedicated a tremendous amount of time, effort and capital towards the construction of skyscrapers, and as technology has advanced, we have managed to build bigger and higher than before. As of 2020, the world's tallest buildings are: - 3rd place - **Shanghai Tower** in China - 632 m (2,073 ft), 128 floors + 5 underground - 2nd place - **Merdeka 118** in Malaysia - 678 m (2,227 ft), 118 floors + 5 underground - 1st place - **Burj Khalifa** in the United Arab Emirates - 828 m (2,717 ft), 163 floors + 1 underground ![](https://i.imgur.com/kxasmEG.jpg)
**At a staggering 828 meters high, Dubai's [Burj Khalifa](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Burj_Khalifa) is the world's tallest building**
The unrelenting ambition of engineering and design to constantly push the boundaries of what is achievable have led to the creation of structures that almost defy logic and physics. Sci-fi movies like *[Blade Runner](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BladeRunner)* (1982) depict a future in which cities consist of multiple monolithic skyscrapers and high-rise buildings for as far as the eye can see. According to the [United Nations,](https://www.un.org/en/development/desa/news/population/world-urbanization-prospects-2014.html) in 2014, 54% of the world's population lived in cities, and if their projections are correct, this figure will increase to 66% (almost two-thirds of the world's population) by 2050! Regardless of whether the future will feature massive levels of urbanization and the creation of Megacities ala *[Judge Dredd,](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/JudgeDredd)* the metaverse is a place (or even multiple places) where just about anything can exist. While some projects are looking to build out and spread across a horizontal plane, others are reaching for the stars...so, without further delay, let's get stuck in! ## Premium Metaverse Real Estate [Ethereum Towers](https://ethereumtowers.com/) is what you might consider to be a (or even the first) 'vertical metaverse' project owing to its rather unique approach. Simply put, Ethereum Towers will consist of: - 2 hyper-modern spiraling towers - 202 floors (101 in each tower) - 4,388 apartments, and - 1 incredible community Upon closer inspection of the project's website, it's clear that a huge amount of time and attention has gone into constructing the two massive skyscrapers that make up Ethereum Towers. This gorgeously rendered jewel of virtual engineering was designed by award-winning architects and is strongly influenced by the design considerations and conventions of the megastructures we see in the world today. According to its creators, Ethereum Towers will be the premiere residence in an ever-expanding metaverse that promises to provide visitors and residents with a dynamic social experience like no other. [IBC DAO](https://www.ibcdao.xyz/) recently announced a collaboration with Ethereum Towers—check out this video one of their community members put together to celebrate it:
![](twitter:IBCDAO/status/1483393467300876295)
## The Way It All Works Ethereum Towers is a community-centered 'vertical metaverse' that exists in two identical 101-story towers. Simply put, players will acquire their own virtual apartments which exist in the form of ERC-721 tokens (or NFTs) on the [Ethereum](https://ethereum.org/) Blockchain. By holding an apartment, players will have full access to the Ethereum Towers Metaverse. Every apartment can be customized and designed in any way a player sees fit. They may choose to furnish their apartments according to their own specifications and divide it up however they wish. Players will also be able to access an in-game marketplace that contains a wide variety of furnishings and accessories. Furthermore, the options available will increase and become more diverse as time goes by. Each and every item will be deployed as an NFT, thus providing players with full ownership over anything they acquire via purchase or exchange. ![](https://i.imgur.com/81OzJ17.png) The main objective is to provide players with an authentic and immersive online experience. Players will be able to interact with one another in their apartments as well as any communal areas located throughout the Towers. By socializing and talking to one another, a real sense of community and togetherness will arise, leaving players with a lasting sense of belonging and wholeness. The Ethereum Towers ecosystem will make use of its very own native in-game currency that will exist as an ERC-20 token. As such, players will be able to use the token to: - Mint in-game items - Trade in-game items - Participate in events, and - Much more! By owning an apartment in Ethereum Towers, players will belong to a truly unique collective and have the honor of living in one of the most exclusive and sought after locations in the Ethereum Worlds Metaverse (and likely the metaverse as a whole). There's no way you want to miss out on this one! > Learn more about Ethereum Towers in their [Lightpaper](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1OT7kCE5fswXvGHLOaLb7Wp8knM6Hz_Si) ## Virtual Real Estate Developers And just who is the team behind Ethereum Towers? Well, the core team consists of the following individuals: - **Jason** - Founder & Chief Executive Officer - **Shane** - Chief Operations Officer - **Brandon** - Chief Product Officer - **Emma** - Culture & Events Director In addition to the core team, Ethereum Towers recently appointed [Dominic Ryder,](https://twitter.com/dominicvemp) the CEO of [vEmpire,](https://v-empire.io/) to their advisory board. Dominic was largely responsible for vEmpire's ascent in the latter half of 2021 and already holds several advisory positions in other upcoming Blockchain/metaverse ventures. He will be assisting Ethereum Towers with their business model, tokenomics, service provider networks and several other aspects of their development for the foreseeable future.
![](twitter:EthereumTowers/status/1478819754685218829?s=20)
> You can find out more about the team and their credentials on page 18 of their [Lightpaper](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1OT7kCE5fswXvGHLOaLb7Wp8knM6Hz_Si) ## Building Plans and Blueprints The final quarter of 2021 was a busy time for Ethereum Towers. Much of the team's efforts focused on laying the foundations for the project, community relations, creating architectural assets, metaverse discovery and technology development. Much more is still planned for 2022 and beyond - just take a look at Ethereum Towers' current Roadmap: ![](https://i.imgur.com/R0Cq7fs.png) > To view the full Roadmap, please click [here](https://ethereumtowers.com/) ## Skyscraper Stats Ethereum Towers' apartments are selling like hotcakes, and if you want one, you'll need to visit their [OpenSea](https://opensea.io/collection/ethereum-towers) page and make an offer there. And now let's take a look at some important stats: *Please Note: Stats are accurate at the time of writing, but be sure to check the original source for the most current information.* - **Total Items** - 1.8K - **Owners** - 1K Ethereum Towers is a serious endeavor with an active team and growing community. On top of this, the project is truly community-centric and has already collaborated with several other reputable projects including [The Doge Pound,](https://thedogepoundnft.com/) [World of Women,](https://worldofwomen.art/) and [The Anatomical Project.](https://theanatomicalproject.com/) By leveraging the power of the community, Ethereum Towers has been able to grow their following and cater to a wider audience in a relatively short space of time. The question is not, 'should I follow Ethereum Towers?' No. The real question is, 'Why haven't I followed them yet!?' Well, in case you haven't, you'd best check out their [Twitter](https://twitter.com/EthereumTowers) and join their [Discord](https://discord.com/invite/ethereumtowers) so that you can get all the latest news and developments ahead of the masses. Oh, and there are also games of Bingo in their Discord (I love Bingo!), so that's just another great reason you should join!
![](twitter:EthTowersSocial/status/1483625908544356352)
That brings us to the end of this trip into the metaverse. What do you think of Ethereum Towers? Be sure to let us know on any of our social media channels. If you don't have a MSQ profile yet, do yourself a favor and get signed up so you can stay informed and enjoy new content as it's published. That's all for now fam—take care of yourselves and see you all again next time! Later! ![](https://i.imgur.com/PAlC9Ss.png) *Join the [MSQ Discord](https://discord.com/invite/d6Es4qRNAQ) and participate in weekly and holiday events when they become available! Make sure you join our growing NFT community so you can stay on top of news, the latest drops, and everything non-fungible.*

Today we take a closer look at an NFT project doing their part to help save the ocean...Fishy Fam!*** ## Water, Water Everywhere! The surface of the Earth is made up of about 71% water, the vast majority of which is brine which, needless to say, cannot be consumed by humans in order for them to stay hydrated. Having said this, the importance of the planet's oceans cannot be overstated. Somewhere between 50 and 80% of all life is found within the oceans, and since so many communities depend on the bounties of the sea for their survival, it's crucial that these massive underwater ecosystems are carefully looked after so that future generations can continue to benefit from them. There is an estimated 5.25 *trillion* pieces of plastic waste in our oceans, which equates to about 46,000 individual pieces of plastic in every square mile of ocean. This is somewhere in the region of 269,000 tonnes of plastic waste. Every single day, nearly 8 million pieces of plastic makes its way into our oceans. Those are some really depressing facts that I wish weren't true, but even if you've only seen some of the material on YouTube and The Discovery Channel, it's pretty clear our oceans are in dire straits. name: The Anatomical Project - Technicolor NFT Organs
body:
***A warm welcome to all of you and thanks for joining us on this epic Discovery of the Day! MSQ recently moved into its Open Beta, meaning you can now sign up for a profile, list your project and check out all the site has to offer. From Monday to Friday we bring you our Discovery of the Day series of articles covering some of our top picks from the world of NFTs, Blockchain gaming and the metaverse! In today's edition we take a look at a truly unique endeavor with an amazing story behind it...this is The Anatomical Project!*** ## Head, Shoulders, Knees and Toes You are not just one thing—and no, I don't mean all the roles you fulfill on a daily basis. Indeed, you are made up of billions and billions of tiny parts...atoms, proteins, neurons, a wide variety of intricately interwoven cells and an untold number of other microscopic things. Despite the incomprehensible vastness of the universe and the infinitesimally tiny building blocks that constitute all matter, one of the greatest sources of fascination and consternation is the human body. If you think about it, the mathematical chances of you being who you are is nigh impossible. If the universe is indeed 13.8 billion years old, that means it took about 13.8 billion years for you to come into being. Far out! So what exactly are the odds? Well, according to a 2011 [Tedx Talk](https://www.ted.com/talks/mel_robbins_how_to_stop_screwing_yourself_over?language=en) by Mel Robbins, about 1 in 400 *trillion.* However, that can't be right, can it? Because you're here, reading this, so given the way time and the mechanics of infinity work, even that which is close to impossible must inevitably come to be... ![](https://i.imgur.com/a4vTeAK.png)
**Is your third eye open yet, anon?** 🌌
The matter that constitutes us didn't simply come out of nowhere. Indeed, all that which is here has 'always' been here, and even after we're long gone, those things that once made us who we are will be somewhere else, part of something else. So yeah, when you look up at the stars at night, or even squint your eyes while trying to catch a glimpse of the Sun, the stuff that comprises them is more or less the same that comprises you. The human body is truly a marvel of engineering, or perhaps more accurately, the product of a very long and profound evolutionary path. However, even though we are sentient beings, it's easy to abuse our bodies with alcohol, narcotics, fatty foods, sugar and so on. The sad thing is that a lot of this isn't necessarily conscious or even deliberate, but invariably we put our bodies through a lot of stress. It's important that we take care of our health, both mental and physical, if we are to weather the many challenges that the modern world hurls headlong at us. If we want to remember who and what we are, we sometimes need to give some considered thought to the things that ensure our continued survival in this perilous existence. ## Meet the Marvelous Melissa! This isn't usually how I start Discoveries of the Day, but because of this project's strong human focus, I think it's important to zoom in on the human being behind it. [Melissa Freund](https://twitter.com/melissa_nft) is a self-taught artist and creator as well as a coloring book author. She is also a mother to a precious daughter and the wife of [Ryan Freund,](https://twitter.com/PoisedMeerkat) an NFT enthusiast and her biggest fan. Melissa is also the winner of the [VeeFriends](https://veefriends.com/) 2021 Pumpkin Carving Contest - I'm not going to try describe this, you can just bear witness to this incredible artistry yourself:
![](twitter:melissa_nft/status/1464044301764149254)
Melissa is definitely a believer and advocate of NFTs. In fact, she's actually a 3x resident at [Ethereum Towers,](https://ethereumtowers.com/) an epic project I recently covered which actually led to me finding out about Melissa and her work. Amazing how things work, right? > Check out this MSQ Discovery of the Day - [Own Prime Metaverse Real Estate in Ethereum Towers!](https://MSQ.io/blog/own-prime-metaverse-real-estate-in-ethereum-towers) So what I'm really asking is, 'Wen Melissa Freund Art Gallery in Ethereum Towers!?' For real though, I'd love to see this happen. Oh would you look at that? I've talked so much I haven't even gotten around to Melissa's project and artwork yet! Forgive me, but the above exposition is all entirely necessary and important, I assure you. Fear not, for your patience and dedication will be duly rewarded...now! ## The Colors Within Us Melissa is a talented NFT artist and the creator of [The Anatomical Project,](https://theanatomicalproject.com/) an effort that began as a result of something very personal and trying to Melissa and her husband. In her own words: > My parenting journey started with the heart. My daughter was born with a rare heart defect & needed open heart surgery at 11 days old. I decided to draw hearts as a way to cope. Melissa then decided to take the hearts she was drawing and published a [Coloring Book](https://www.amazon.com/ANATOMICAL-HEARTS-COLORING-Melissa-Freund/dp/1952058015/ref=sr_1_1?keywords=melissa+freund&qid=1637704215&sr=8-1) back in May 2021: ![](https://i.imgur.com/jV6bKMe.jpg) A few months later, in September 2021, Melissa created a 100 piece Genesis NFT collection called [Anatomical Hearts.](https://opensea.io/collection/anatomicalhearts) Here's an example of one of these amazing hearts: ![](https://i.imgur.com/c1W06UE.jpg) > Melissa's work features a beautiful cacophony of colors and, as seen here in **[Anatomical Heart #92,](https://opensea.io/assets/0x495f947276749ce646f68ac8c248420045cb7b5e/28824502245252267217549902857601847351510039266873569823091148231597644316673)** a huge amount of fine detail, unique patterns and intricate line work. Her work ranges in terms of its geometric designs and lucidity, but regardless, her Genesis project never fails to be anything short of visually compelling and stunningly rendered, evoking a strong emotional response from the viewer Melissa was so inspired and moved by the overall feedback she received (as well as the many relationships she formed) that she decided to extend her collection in an effort to further support the medical community... ## A True Body of Work Yes indeed, the Anatomical Project includes the following different body parts that Melissa hopes will help others to connect her art with their own personal journeys: - Hearts 100/100 (**Completed**) - Brains 23/100 - Kidneys 22/100 - Livers 23/100 - Lungs 24/100 - Eyes 2/100 - Skulls 2/100 - Uteruses 2/100 - DNA 2/100 > ***Disclaimer**: The above information is accurate at the time of writing, but be sure to check The Anatomical Project's [OpenSea](https://opensea.io/collection/theanatomicalproject) page for the latest details* As it appears, the final collection (at least at this point) will consist of no less than 900 pieces of original art by Melissa herself. She's making sterling progress but has some way to go until the collection is complete, so you'll definitely want to get your piece now while she's still hard at work. Let's take a brief look at some of the current pieces from The Anatomical Project: ![](https://i.imgur.com/0oR4eYQ.jpg)
**How about this super intricate pair of lungs?**
![](https://i.imgur.com/kTvnKbJ.jpg)
**Another imaginative but tasteful use of color by Melissa in this liver**
![](https://i.imgur.com/0PtXQ3n.jpg)
**I adore the colors in these kidneys - almost looks edible!**
## Body and Soul Stats So as you can see, Melissa's work is truly visionary, meaningful and lovingly rendered. There's a joyful musicality within her pieces, and I can't help but think about bands like [Tears for Fears,](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tears_for_Fears) [Tool](https://toolband.com/) and even [Alice in Chains](https://aliceinchains.com/) when I look at these pieces (I'm sure you'll relate your own worldviews and stories to these pieces, but these are just some of mine). I think I could very well go on about Melissa's work for ages, but the main point to keep in mind here is that, regardless of where you are in the world, because we are all made of the same stuff and share similar experiences, we can connect with Melissa's work because it is so recognizable and characteristically **human.** And now for some OpenSea stats! _Please Note: Stats are accurate at the time of writing, but be sure to check the original source for the most current information._ ### [Anatomical Hearts](https://opensea.io/collection/anatomicalhearts) * **Available Items** - 100 * **Owners** - 67 ### [The Anatomical Project](https://opensea.io/collection/theanatomicalproject) * **Available Items** - 122 * **Owners** - 56 Please also note the following disclaimer as per the Anatomical Project website: > Only limited personal non-commercial use and resale rights in the NFT are granted, and you have no right to license, commercially exploit, reproduce, distribute, prepare derivative works, publicly perform, or publicly display the NFT or the music or the artwork therein. All copyright and other rights are reserved and not granted And that brings us to the end of this story my dear friends. You definitely want to follow The Anatomical Project on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nft_hearts) and join Melissa's [Discord](https://discord.com/invite/yJSuTWhfzx) so you can get all the latest news and updates as and when they become available. So what do you think of Melissa and The Anatomical Project? Be sure to let us know on our socials. If you don't have a MSQ profile yet, make sure you sign up as soon as possible so you can explore the site and enjoy everything it has to offer. Thanks for joining me today! name: Ethalien - Friendly NFT Extraterrestrials
body:
***Hey everyone and welcome to another killer Discovery of the Day! MSQ recently moved into its Open Beta, meaning you can now sign up for a profile and explore all the site has to offer. From Monday to Friday we bring you some of the best projects from across the cryptosphere. Whether it's NFTs, the metaverse or Blockchain games, you'll find it all right here on MSQ! Today we take a closer look at some interstellar travelers who have found a new home on Earth...This is Ethalien!*** ## Aliens...Exist!? In the last few decades there have been numerous discoveries that suggest life exists beyond the familiar atmosphere of our beloved planet Earth. There have been several 'sightings' where UFOs have been spotted hovering or careening across our skies, and who can forget all the controversy surrounding the [Roswell Incident](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roswell_incident) of 1947? Regardless of your thoughts and theories on these strange occurrences, there are other, shall we say, more 'scientific' pieces of evidence that would incontrovertibly prove the existence of extraterrestrial life in some form or another: - [Alien bacteria might live in the clouds of Venus](https://www.npr.org/2020/09/14/912619891/a-possible-sign-of-life-right-next-door-to-earth-on-venus?t=1643031608627) - [Oumuamua could still be an alien artifact](https://www.livescience.com/oumuamua-interstellar-hydrogen-or-aliens.html) - [This blurry photo of an 'alien'](https://www.mirror.co.uk/news/weird-news/man-snaps-naked-alien-bulbous-25855895) (OK, maybe not *this* one) Although these are all very intriguing, we have yet to see indisputable proof that aliens *actually* exist. Time and time again, conspiracy theories, UFO sightings and alleged scientific research have been debunked. Despite this, maybe, just maybe, 2022 will be the year aliens finally make contact... ![](https://i.imgur.com/tpEev9m.png)
**Oumuamua, a mysterious, interstellar object that drifted into our solar system about two years ago**
However, we have seen proof of aliens living in the metaverse—[The Alien Boys,](https://www.thealienboy.com/) [Lonely Alien Space Club,](https://lonelyaliens.com/) and [Alien Frens](https://alienfrens.io/) are just a handful of the otherworldly visitors currently dwelling within our solar system. These aren't the only extraterrestrials around though—as it turns out, there's a new species in town, and they're infiltrating and living on our very own blue orb, Earth! Today, we bring you [Ethalien!](https://www.ethaliens.com/) 👽 ![](https://i.imgur.com/RuWyBWP.png)
**Lonely Alien Space Club, Alien Frens & The Alien Boys**
## When Worlds Collide [Ethalien](https://www.ethaliens.com/) is a collection of 7,500 NFTs that fled their home planet, Zerkton, and now inhabit Earth. The focus of the project is to facilitate a strong community and become a major player within the realms of Play-to-Earn (P2E) gaming. However, these funky Ethaliens are just the tip of the iceberg in the wider Ethalien Metaverse. ![](https://i.imgur.com/eFZjQW2.png) ### Baby Ethaliens Throughout December and January, if you held two Ethaliens and 300 $STAR, you were eligible to breed them in order to create a Baby Ethalien! These cute little guys come with plenty of utility and give you access to exciting features such as: - The Web3 Starcade and Play-to-Earn Adventure Quests - The ability to earn Star Dust, $STAR & limited-edition Ethalien NFTs - Access to the exclusive Alpha Lounge - The opportunity to enter $STAR raffles - Exclusive Baby Ethalien Merchandise, and - Future Whitelist Opportunities Wow! Now that really is a ton of utility! Now let's take a look at some of these sweet Baby Ethaliens 👀 ![](https://i.imgur.com/SADP4On.png) ### $STAR Token, STAR Shop & STARcade $STAR is an ERC-20 utility token that fuels the Ethalien Ecosystem. It's capped at a total of 69,420,000 *(ba dum tss!)* Each Ethalien generates 5 $STAR per day for a total of 5 years. *That's what I call long-term utility!* The token can be used throughout every collection (Ethalien, Baby Ethalien & Ethalien VOX) as well as the STAR Shop, STAR Auction and Starcade. * The [$STAR shop](https://www.ethaliens.com/shop) is a place where you can purchase the $STAR badge, Twitter and Discord Banners, NFTs and much more * The [Starcade](https://www.ethaliens.com/starcade) is simple—spend $STAR to play $STARCADE games for the chance to win more $STAR ### Ethalien VOX Last but not least, let's talk about the latest addition to the Ethalien Metaverse...**Ethalien VOX**! These Ethaliens can be used in any metaverse that supports .vox files (we're talking [The Sandbox](https://www.sandbox.game/en/), [Cryptovoxels](https://www.cryptovoxels.com/), and so on). In addition, mystery asset boxes will be available with the $STAR token in the STAR shop for your Ethalien VOX. Now let's take a gander at these lil guys! ![](https://i.imgur.com/TWchsxn.gif) The Ethalien VOX whitelist presale will take place on January 28th with the public sale following one day thereafter—the reveal will take place upon sell out, so get your wallets ready people! ## The Plan(et) Ahead Ethaliens have a nifty Roadmap with exciting features such as the Ethalien Vox Collection (as I mentioned above), the $STARcade and the mysterious 'Project Empyrean.' Check out our version of their Roadmap below! ![](https://i.imgur.com/IfXww2q.png) > View the full original Roadmap [here](https://www.ethaliens.com/home) ## Otherworldly Stats Ethaliens and Baby Ethaliens can be purchased via the secondary market on OpenSea. Let's take a look at some stats, shall we? _Please Note: Stats are accurate at the time of writing, but be sure to check the original source for the most current information._ ### [Ethalien](https://opensea.io/collection/ethalien) - **Available Items** - 7.5K - **Owners** - 1.7K ### [Baby Ethalien](https://opensea.io/collection/baby-ethalien) - **Available Items** - 1.2K - **Owners** - 353 The team behind Ethalien is currently getting ready for the upcoming Vox collection mint in a few days. With its colorful and sleek art style and growing community of supporters, Ethalien is definitely a project to keep a close eye on. Make sure you follow them on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ethaliensnft) and join their [Discord](https://discord.com/invite/ethalien) so that you can secure a place on their whitelist and be ready to mint one of these sweet aliens! And here ends this journey everyone. What do you think of Ethalien? Let us know via any of our social media pages. If you don't have a MSQ profile yet, make sure you sign up for one so that you can receive all the latest news and check out everything the site has to offer. Oh, and get your friends and family to sign up too...after all, MSQ is for everyone, and that's how we'd like to keep it! Thanks for your time, it is always greatly appreciated! Take care of yourselves and see you around! ![](https://i.imgur.com/skM5Jzl.png) *Join the [MSQ Discord](https://discord.com/invite/d6Es4qRNAQ) and participate in weekly and holiday events when they become available! Make sure you join our growing NFT community so you can stay on top of news, the latest drops, and everything non-fungible.*
